author: robbie
msg: QPID-3165: ensure all subscriptions are checked before making the decision on whether to stop delivering. Use a boolean instead of doing a 0/1 toggle and update variables to generally clarify logic. Use an int instead of a Long for the iteration decrementing

author: robbie
msg: QPID-3166: add system test using multiple batch transacted producers with multiple consumers using unique selectors. Exposes issue detailed in QPID-3165.

msg: French postal address is a feminine noum and so, should have an 'e'
